name: A Better World, Team-Up
effect:
Play only if [JLA Icon] and [Teen Titans Icon] are affiliations among characters you control.

name: Abra Kadabra, Magical Rogue
effect: When Abra Kadabra enters play, target player reveals his hand and loses 1 endurance for each character card revealed.

name: Acceptable Loss
effect:
To play, KO a Secret Society character you control.
Target character you control gets +4 ATK this attack.

name: Agamemno, Interplanetary Conqueror
effect: Whenever a character is recruited, a location is flipped, or a plot twist is played, each player draws a card.

name: All Too Easy
effect: Target Injustice Gang attacker you control gets +1/-1 this attack for each card in target opponent's hand.

name: Amazo, Power Duplication
effect: Whenever Amazo enters combat, he gains the powers and keywords of all opposing attackers and defenders this attack.

effect:
To play, remove a Secret Society character card in your KO'd pile from the game.
Target attacker you control gets +4/+4 this attack if it has the same name as that card.

effect: Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if you control Darkseid, each opponent loses 3 endurance unless he KO's a card in play he controls.

effect: Free [>] Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand if it shares a name with a character you control. Use only once per turn.

Reservist
